projects.title: Litter PSA
projects.desc: Don't be a litter-bug! This public service announcement was created by my friend, motion graphics designer Gabe Schwartz (http://www.gabeschwartz.com/). It was a volunteer piece "contracted out" to motion graphics students at Ex'pression College for Digital Arts by the TakePride.org campaign. I recorded the voice over performed by Lia Rubinoff and mixed it with the stock music provided to me. I was happy to be a part of this feel-good project.

projects.title: Berkeley Shelters
projects.desc: Student volunteers came together to create this showcase for the Suitcase Clinic to highlight the amazing services they provide to the Berkeley community. With a recent loss of city funding, this video premiered at a fundraiser for shelters to encourage donations. I contributed by providing some production sound on location, as well as helping out on the post side with some noise reduction and mixing. I would like to give thanks to all of the UC Berkeley med students that volunteer at these clinics, they are all amazing people!

projects.title: Safe Now
projects.desc: "Safe Now" is a short film that was produced during an event held by the organization "Making Movies Throughout the Bay" (http://www.facebook.com/MMTB1). The event was a one-day film-fest; group members chosen at random and scripts written on the spot. We were given a little under a month for post production. I acted as boom operator and sound mixer during production as well as sound designer and re-recording mixer during post. For such a short project, this came out incredible!

projects.title: The Proxy Father
projects.desc: Bringing a simple joke to life, "The Proxy Father" is an entertaining short comedy. I acted as the boom operator and sound mixer during production as well as the re-recording mixer during post. I had a lot of fun on location with everybody involved in this film.

projects.title: ChooseYou
projects.desc: This advertisement for ChooseYou.com was created to be entered into a contest hosted by Poptent.net, a crowdsourcing media production hub for companies that offer cash prizes to the best user-generated content. Shot in March 2011, my roles in this production were boom operator/sound mixer, VO recordist, and re-recording mixer. Although my team did not win the contest I am still very proud of how this came out!

projects.title: You Belong To Me
projects.desc: Living with a demon-possessed family member can be difficult, to say the least. Part of the 2011 San Jose 3-Day Film Challenge. I acted as the Sound Mixer and Boom Operator for this short film.

projects.title: Out of Nowhere
projects.desc: An eerie tone is set up for the uncomfortable experience of a man who's looking for love in the wrong place. I acted as the Sound Mixer and Boom Operator for this short film.
